pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## What is AbuSentry?AbuSentry is a collection of scripts that can be used by security professionals or analysts to perform various security related tasks. Tasks that are performed by the scripts include, but are not limited to, vetting the status of a URL, extracting text from a URL, performing a urlscan analysis, and performing a virustotal analysis, and more.## Installation### Using PIPThe abusentry toolkit is available on [PyPI](https://pypi.python.org/pypi), see [https://pypi.python.org/pypi/abusentry](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/abusentry).The easiest way to install it is using [pip](https://pip.readthedocs.org/en/latest/installing.html).```bashpip3 install abusentry```> **Note:**> If an error occurs during the installation process, check your permissions. It might be required to run pip as root.### From ScratchIt's also possible to install the library from it's source code. You will then be able to use the latest possible version or even try the [develop branch](https://github.com/xransum/abusentry/tree/dev).The first step is to clone the repository of the project:```bashgit clone https://github.com/xransum/abusentry.git```Then, you can install the library using the following command:```bashcd abusentrypython3 setup.py install```## Usage### Command Line InterfaceThe abusentry toolkit comes with a command line interface (CLI) that allows you to use the tools from your terminal.```bashabusentry --help```But you can also use the tools directly from the command line:abusentry interface:```bashabusentry --help```dnscheck script:```bashdnscheck --help```ipcheck script:```bashipcheck --help```sniper script:```bashsniper --help```urlscan script:```bashurlscan --help```virustotal script:```bashvirustotal --help```unshorten script:```bashunshorten --help```## DocumentationThe documentation is available at the following address: [https://github.com/xransum/abusentry](https://github.com/xransum/abusentry).It contains how to use the library and even how to contribute, plus it contains the technical documentation for the project.
